cz.cuni.mff.kocur.configuration

Class HeroConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.configuration.Configuration
      • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.configuration.HeroConfiguration
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AiConfiguration, BotConfiguration, PlayerConfiguration

    public abstract class HeroConfiguration
extends Configuration
    Class that stores bot configuration. Bot configuration file is a JSON file with structure like this: { "name" : "bot_lina", "configuration" : { "class": { "type": "CText", "label": "Please type in class of your bot.", "help": "While starting server, the bot object will be ..", "value": "kocur.lina.bot.Bot" } ... Top level variables will get deserialized into items map inherited from Configuration. Variables inside "configuration" will be deserialized into CItem and stored in configuration map.
    Author:
    Banzindun
